pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'foreach' Parallel Adapter for 'parabar' Backends // Provides a 'foreach' parallel adapter for 'parabar' backends. This package offers a minimal implementation of the '%dopar%' operator, enabling users to run 'foreach' loops in parallel, leveraging the parallel and progress-tracking capabilities of the 'parabar' package. Learn more about 'parabar' and 'doParabar' at https://parabar.mihaiconstantin.com.
